author: Paul Kasabian
title: JuJu Smith-Schuster Plays Madden NFL 20 with Fans Online Via EA's 'Stay & Play'
description: Pittsburgh Steelers  wide receiver  JuJu Smith-Schuster  played three fans in Madden  NFL  2020 as part EA's #StayAndPlay initiative, which was enacted to persuade people to stay home amid the  COVID-19 pandemic a nd play video games...
content:
Steven Ryan/Getty Images
Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver JuJu Smith-Schuster played three fans in Madden NFL 2020 as part EA's #StayAndPlay initiative, which was enacted to persuade people to stay home amid the COVID-19 pandemic and play video games.
